ygData.subject: Re: Interesting bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, heh!  Thought you saw my corpse in Perma and were razzing me :oP ... From: Elijah Meeker  To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, heh! Thought you saw my corpse in Perma and were razzing me :oP
-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker <elijah@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 5:50 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Interesting bug


>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
>> Dream on lugnut ;ppp
>> I popped back in the path of the one remaining gobbie, and proceeded to
>> pummel his arse.
>> (I died later due to trains from below... thanks alot Gears :o/ )
>
>
>No really, you died (lugnut?) while zoning. And as a result of the bug were
>timewarped back. I know wherefore I am talking here.
>
>It's just a jump to the left,
>then a step to the right
>put your hands on your hips
>bring your knees in tight
>Then it's a pelvic thrust
>it really drives you insaaaaaane
>Let's Do The Time Warp Again!
>
>
>Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
